name: KIVIK Sofa
description: Cuddle up in the comfortable KIVIK sofa. The generous size, low armrests and pocket springs with foam that adapts to the body invites you and your guests to many hours of socializing and relaxation.

name: MÖRBYLÅNGA Dining Table
description: The oak top layer and dovetail joints give the table a solid, crafted expression. This table is full of character and since it's round, you can always find space for at least one more friend.

name: POÄNG Armchair
description: POÄNG armchair has stylish curved lines in bentwood, providing nice support for the neck and comfy resilience. It's been in our range for several decades and is still just as popular. Want to try it too?

name: MALM Bed Frame
description: A clean design that's just as beautiful on all sides – place the bed on its own or with the headboard against a wall. If you need space for extra bedding, add MALM bed storage boxes on casters.

name: LACK Coffee Table
description: LACK table in black-brown is easy to match with other furnishings. The honeycomb structured paper filling construction adds strength to the table while keeping it lightweight so it´s easy to move around.

name: BILLY Bookcase
description: BILLY bookcase is a beloved icon that never goes out of style. Thanks to its versatility you can use it in many different ways at home – regardless of whether you store books or everyday items in it.

name: HEMNES Dresser
description: A classic chest of drawers in solid wood, with a traditional look and modern functions like quiet, smooth-running drawers. The drawer interlock reduce the tip-over risk when combined with wall-anchoring.

name: KALLAX Shelf Unit
description: Standing or lying – the KALLAX series adapts to taste, space and budget. Personalize the shelving unit with inserts and boxes to make it suit your needs.

name: UPPLAND Armchair
description: This can easily become your favourite place at home. EKTORP armchair is welcoming and generous with comfy soft and supportive cushions – and the cover is also removable and machine washable.

name: DANDERYD Dining Table
description: A table for 4 with a durable surface in lacquered MDF and softly shaped steel legs. Here, it's the small details that create a perfect unity of beauty and strength that feels both traditional and modern.

name: BRIMNES TV Unit
description: When it's organized by the TV it's easier to indulge in your favorite TV series. Keep your games, controls and accessories in the large drawers and feed the cords through the outlets in the back.

name: FRIHETEN Sleeper Sofa
description: After a good night's sleep, you can effortlessly convert your bedroom or guest room into a living room again. The built-in storage is easy to access and spacious enough to store bedding, books and PJs.

name: PAX Wardrobe
description: Do you dream of a beautiful wardrobe for your bedroom? Here´s the solution for you! Start with frames, after that add KOMPLEMENT series that stores all your clothes, shoes and accessories. In the end, just personalize it by adding your favorite doors.

name: STRANDMON Wing Chair
description: Bringing new life to an old favorite. We first introduced this chair in the 1950's. Some 60 years later we brought it back into the range with the same craftsmanship, comfort and appearance. Enjoy!

name: HEMNES Coffee Table
description: Natural beauty in solid pine. A durable and renewable material that maintains its genuine character with each passing year. Looks great together with other furniture in the HEMNES series.

name: TROTTEN Desk
description: Changing positions from sitting to standing is good for you, and the crank handle allows you to work your arms while adjusting the height. Moving your body makes you both feel and work better.

name: NORDLI Chest of Drawers
description: Keep everything from clothes to accessories organized with NORDLI chest of drawers. It comes in various sizes that looks great when combined, all in Scandinavian clean design with soft-closing drawers.

name: SÖDERHAMN Sectional Sofa
description: If you like the stylish airy look, you have to try the deep generous seats. Create your own personal combination of SÖDERHAMN sofa, then sit down and relax – by yourself or together with the whole family.

name: LISABO Side Table
description: We're proud of our LISABO series, awarded with the prestigious, international Red Dot Award, for its design. The products are durable, sturdy and easy to assemble, yet look light and hand-crafted.

name: FJÄLLBO Shelf Unit
description: A perfect shelving unit for a rustic look. The metal gives an industrial feel and the solid wood makes every piece of furniture unique. The open back also makes it easy to access power sockets.

name: SONGESAND Bed Frame
description: A sturdy bed frame with soft, profile edges and high legs. A classic shape that will last for many years. Also, there are spacious storage boxes under the bed where you can store bedding or clothes.

name: SKÅDIS Pegboard
description: Perfect for your home office, but goes just as well in a bathroom, hallway or kitchen to have small items close at hand. Complete with SKÅDIS accessories to create the best storage for your needs.

name: NORDEN Gateleg Table
description: Gateleg tables have been around for centuries – with the space-saving design it's no wonder why. We gave this table a straightforward, Scandinavian look and added a few drawers for flatware and napkins.

name: BESTÅ TV Storage Combination
description: BESTÅ TV storage combinations provide a home for your TV and storage for the gadgets you need for all the activities around it. Hide the clutter and display your favorite things in one magnificent combo!

name: KULLEN Chest of Drawers
description: A simple chest of drawers with a clean look and room for both your favorite clothes and extra bedding. The feet act as a built-in support and reduce the risk of tip-over when combined with wall-anchoring.

name: RAKKESTAD Wardrobe with 3 doors
description: Simple and smart! When all you need is a wardrobe with all the basic functions. If storage space is still not enough, why not add another wardrobe from the RAKKESTAD series?

name: GURSKEN Wardrobe with 2 doors
description: GURSKEN wardrobe has a simple, clean design – perfect for furnishing an apartment or guest room quickly and easily. A great match with the bedside table, chest of drawers and bed in the same series!

name: NORDKISA Open wardrobe with sliding door
description: This wardrobe is inspired by classic Scandinavian furniture design with clean lines and an airy expression. It works as storage for your clothes and belongings – and will be a statement piece in your home.

name: HAUGA Storage combination with drawers
description: Use throughout the home, on its own or with other furniture in the HAUGA series. This wide combination has plenty of storage space – and the top is ideal for a lamp or for display.

name: AURDAL Wardrobe combination
description: Do you want to utilize the small and tricky places in your home? With AURDAL storage system you can customize a solution to fit all storage needs for shoes and clothes in the reach-in or walk-in closets.

name: PAX/HASVIK Wardrobe with sliding doors
description: Keep it simple. Here's a basic solution to get you started, and space for more interiors if you want to upgrade.

name: PAX/KAMMARTORP/GRIMO Wardrobe combination
description: Keep it simple. Here's a basic solution to get you started, and space for more interiors if you want to upgrade.

name: PAX/FORSAND Wardrobe combination
description: Keep it simple. Here's a basic solution to get you started, and space for more interiors if you want to upgrade.

name: PAX/AULI Wardrobe with sliding doors
description: Keep it simple. Here's a basic solution to get you started, and space for more interiors if you want to upgrade.

name: PAX/STORKLINTA Wardrobe combination
description: A versatile wardrobe combination that offers ample storage space and can be customized to fit your needs. Interior accessories, knobs and handles are sold separately.

name: ÄNGSIÖN/ORRSJÖN Bathroom vanity with sink & faucet
description: ÄNGSIÖN bathroom furniture has a modern appeal with minimal details so you can start each day with a clean slate. This combo has 2 spacious drawers and room on the sink for toothbrush and soap.

name: FAXÄLVEN Mirror cabinet with built-in lighting
description: A mirror cabinet that charms with the warm look of wood combined with integrated lighting that brightens the space and helps you to carry out your daily routines. To be completed with RODRET wireless dimmer/power switch, sold separately.

name: RUNSKÄR Faucet
description: A durable brass-colored tap in a traditional style with separate handles for hot and cold water. The built-in aerator regulates the water flow, which in turn helps to reduce water- and energy-use.

name: ÄNGSIÖN/OXMYREN Bathroom vanity with sink & faucet
description: ÄNGSIÖN bathroom furniture has a modern appeal with minimal details. This wash-stand with countertop and a wash-basin in glass creates a personal and stylish centerpiece in your bathroom.

name: TÖRNVIKEN Countertop sink
description: Ceramic sink are admired for their smooth, durability beauty. Made with quality materials and the best manufacturing techniques, we proudly offer a 10-year warranty on all our ceramic sinks.

name: OXMYREN Countertop sink
description: This elegant and generously sized statement piece in dark grey glass brings an unexpected and refined look to your bathroom. Pairs beautifully with our wash-basin cabinets and TOLKEN countertops.

name: RAMEBO Mirror
description: RAMEBO mirror has a gold-colored frame with beautiful ornaments in a vintage style. The ornaments can easily be removed and put back for variation – either way, the mirror is an eye-catcher in your home.

name: LINDBYN Mirror
description: By decorating with mirrors, you add depth to a room and give it more life. The round LINDBYN mirror has a soft expression and the black frame and neat design feel elegant.

name: VATTENSJÖN Shower curtain
description: Colorful shower curtain featuring a fish pattern that brings a playful touch to your bathroom decor.

name: TÄNNFORSEN/ORRSJÖN Bathroom vanity with sink & faucet
description: TÄNNFORSEN bathroom furniture expresses classic elegance with beveled edges that add a crafted look. This combo has 2 spacious drawers and room on the wash-basin for toothbrushes and soap.

name: TÄNNFORSEN/RUTSIÖN Bathroom vanity with doors/sink/faucet
description: TÄNNFORSEN bathroom furniture expresses classic elegance with beveled edges that add a crafted look. This combo offers closed storage and a raised backsplash to reinforce the traditional appeal.

name: HAVBÄCK/ORRSJÖN Bathroom vanity with sink & faucet
description: In a shared bathroom, this solution offers your own private drawer – or two. The sink is paired with a roomy countertop where you can place things while getting ready for the day ahead.

name: TÄNNFORSEN/RUTSJÖN Double vanity with sink & faucet
description: Your own personal space in a shared space. A balanced solution with plenty of drawers for each and every need and 2 sinks that work in unison to ensure everyone gets their teeth brushed in time.

name: LILLTJÄRN/SKATSJÖN Bathroom vanity with 2 doors
description: In small-size bathrooms, no space should go to waste. This wash-basin cabinet uses the space under the small rounded wash-basin for storing things like towels, toilet paper and hygiene products.

name: ENHET Bathroom vanity with 2 drawers
description: ENHET series makes it easy to start fresh with a new bathroom solution. This base cabinet for sink has 2 handy drawers for essentials, and oak effect fronts that create a warm and lively expression.

name: SKRUVBY Sideboard
description: The SKRUVBY series has a traditional look with matching solitary storage units. The sideboard has a top panel with a warm oak feel, open shelves and closed storage in a drawer and behind grooved doors.

name: LOMMARP Cabinet
description: This storage series is inspired by traditional carpentry, combining style and functions for today's urban lifestyles. Use it wherever you need storage — and mix with other furniture for a personal look.

name: Storage combination with doors/drawers
description: This pair offers plenty of closed and open storage. Both with a grey-green color that brings nature's harmonious color scale into your room – and stained shelves which highlight the beauty of the solid wood.

name: LANESUND Sideboard
description: A piece of furniture that has both space for displaying and storing things. Put something nice on top to complete the look and enjoy a solid, practical storage solution that's also an eye-catcher.

name: HEMNES Glass-door cabinet with 3 drawers
description: Sustainable beauty from sustainably-sourced solid pine, a natural and renewable material that gets more beautiful with each passing year. Like it? Combine with other products in the HEMNES series.

name: Hauga Cabinet
description: Traditional cabinet with storage behind glass doors, in a drawer and on open shelves. Great for dinnerware, books and various beloved items. Use on its own or with other furniture in the HAUGA series.

name: HAUGA Sideboard
description: Traditional sideboard with storage behind glass doors, in a drawer and on open shelves. Great for dinnerware, books and various beloved items. Use on its own or with other furniture in the HAUGA series.

name: IDANAS Cabinet with bi-folding doors
description: IDANAS series combines timeless design with modern functionality. With its clever folding doors shut, the cabinet adds elegance to your home. Ideal for storing clothes, table cloths and other small items.

name: TONSTAD Storage with sliding glass doors
description: Classic design meets beautifully brushed veneer in the TONSTAD series – giving the furniture a unique character. This combination has both hidden and open storage, so you can choose what to display.

name: KALKNÄS Cabinet with sliding doors
description: Hide all clutter behind the finely embossed doors and display your decorative objects behind the glass doors. KALKNÄS cabinet also comes prepared for cable management so you can easily add lighting.

name: MALSJÖ Sideboard
description: A piece of furniture that has both space for displaying and storing things. Put something nice on top to complete the look and enjoy a solid, practical storage solution that's also an eye-catcher.

name: ONSEVIG Rug, low pile
description: The faded oriental expression of this rug adds a special touch to your room. A good choice for those who want a durable, stain-resistant rug that is just as great on the sofa as under the dining table.

name: STOENSE Rug, low pile
description: The thick, soft-spun pile is all about comfort, combined with gentle colors and a light sheen that bring harmony to the room. Large floor? Place several rugs together – the thick pile conceals the edges.

name: VÄGSKYLT Door mat
description: A warm and cheerful expression greets you as you walk through the door. The playful design welcomes you home.

name: Vimpelgras rug
description: A warm and cheerful expression greets you as you walk through the door. The playful design welcomes you home.

name: GADBIERG Rug, low pile
description: The faded oriental expression of this rug adds a special touch to your room. A good choice for those who want a durable, stain-resistant rug that is just as great on the sofa as under the dining table.

name: SONHULT Nesting tables, set of 2
description: Mix and match like never before with the 2 SONHULT nest tables. Change the style and expression whenever you like by switching which legs go on which table top.

name: HOLMERUD Coffee table
description: HOLMERUD coffee table has a distinctive architectural shape that will draw attention. The design also offers practical, open storage spaces where you can display your things and keep them close at hand.

name: STARKVIND Table with air purifier
description: Both a side table and an air purifier that improves the indoor air quality. STARKVIND can be adjusted manually, set to auto mode or be connected to DIRIGERA hub for full control via IKEA Home smart app.

name: HAVSTA Nesting tables, set of 2
description: Carefully designed details in solid pine with a brushed surface adds a rustic feel and charm to your home. These nesting tables can be used in various ways – individually or pushed together to save space.

name: DELSIÓN Kitchen faucet
description: DELSIÓN brass faucet's high spout makes it easier to wash things like large pots. We've given it durable parts and put it through some of the toughest tests, so we can give you a guarantee of quality.

name: KILSVIKEN Sink
description: The natural color variations of the quartz make each KILSVIKEN sink one of a kind bringing a unique look to your kitchen. The surface is durable and resistant to heat and stains.

name: SEKTION/MAXIMERA Wall cabinet with 2 doors/2 drawers
description: SEKTION kitchen system gives you endless possibilities to design your dream kitchen. Paired with AXSTAD fronts in grey-green, you get a timeless look that can feel either modern or traditional.

name: TORNVIKEN Kitchen island
description: The TORNVIKEN series is ideal when you need more workspace, more storage – more kitchen. Combine a kitchen island with shelves to create a rustic kitchen where you can cook together. Everyone can fit!

name: VADHOLMA Kitchen island
description: Gather around the kitchen island! VADHOLMA is the home’s given meeting point and perfect when you cook together. Plenty of storage – and the generous butcher block gives you a robust workspace.

name: NORDVIKEN Extendable table
description: This spacious, wood dining table has a traditional feel and will soon become a natural gathering place in your home. The sturdy construction and smooth extension mechanism make it a long-lasting favorite.

name: HÄGERNÄS Bar table and 4 bar stools
description: The look and finish of this bar table work well both in kitchens and dining rooms.

name: EKENABBEN Open shelf unit
description: Flexible and easy-to-place. EKENABBEN shelving unit has a simple design with open storage that helps you keep track of your things. Or you can customize it with boxes that suit your storage needs.

name: HEMNES 2-drawer chest
description: A classic smaller-sized chest of drawers in solid wood, with a traditional look and modern function. Quiet, smooth-running drawers makes it easy to organize your things. Psst! Please attach to the wall.

name: VARMBLIXT LED table/wall lamp
description: When the light passes through the lamp's orange glass, the soft donut-like shape shines with a warm glow. A magical sight that's an eye-catcher, regardless if it's on a table or hanging on a wall.

name: HÄCKPOPPEL Decorative bowl
description: Organic shapes can give a soothing sense of bringing nature into the home. The HÄCKPOPPEL glass bowl is inspired by Swedish lakes and has a fluid shape that mimics gentle ripples on the surface of water.

name: DEKAD Alarm clock
description: A modern quartz movement is hidden in this alarm clock with a clean and classic design. So you avoid being disturbed by a ticking sound as time passes, but you'll surely hear it when it's time to wake up.

name: HEMNES Dressing table with mirror
description: Dressing table or desk? You don't need to decide – there's enough space for both makeup, pens and a laptop. The soft shapes create a romantic silhouette that becomes the focal point in the room.

name: HEMNES TV storage combination
description: Sustainable beauty from sustainably-sourced solid pine, a natural and renewable material that gets more beautiful with each passing year. Like it? Combine with other products in the HEMNES series.

name: DVÄRGTALL Decorative figure, set of 3
description: The decorative DVÄRGTALL figures, designed by Inma Bermudez, are playful friends with three different personalities. You can combine them in many creative ways and even swap their legs.

name: SJÄLSLIGT Decoration, set of 3
description: You can decorate your home with green plants without having to water them, since the cactuses are made from ceramic.

name: SILVTJÄRN Container
description: Freshen your bathroom with a bit of bling using SILVTJÄRN accessories. This glass container is perfect for make-up remover pads, cotton balls or jewelry - and the stylish lid can double as a soap dish

name: FEJKA Artificial potted plant
description: Enjoy a cherry tree in bloom – all year round. This lifelike potted plant is artificial and is comprised of more than 50% recycled plastic. And it's easy to bring home since it comes in parts.

name: DAJLIEN 4-piece exercise set
description: Improve your flexibility with the yoga strap, use the knee cushions to reduce pressure on your knees, hands or elbows while you exercise – and then roll the massage ball over sore points when you're done.

name: BROFJÄRDEN 3-piece bathroom set
description: BROFJÄRDEN bathroom accessories with shiny chrome-plated details reminisce of elegant, lasting designs of the past. This bathroom set of 3 is ideal for toothbrushes, soap and smaller items.

name: VÄLVÅRDAD Soap dispenser
description: This traditional-styled soap dispenser gives your kitchen a new and rustic expression. Easy to fill with washing-up liquid, sanitizer or anything else needed when washing up or cleaning the sink.

name: BRUGDHAJ Salt & pepper shaker
description: Decorative and practical food storage on the worktop — or a nice detail to display on a table. The BRUGDHAJ series is in rustic stoneware with a beautifully glazed surface that matches the GLADELIG series.

name: BRUGDHAJ Oil/vinegar bottle
description: Decorative and practical food storage on the worktop — or a nice detail to display on a table. The BRUGDHAJ series is in rustic stoneware with a beautifully glazed surface that matches the GLADELIG series.

name: HALVTOM Spice mill
description: HALVTOM jars for spices create a trendy restaurant feel at home. The sculptural shape and the brown glass mean that you'll happily have them visible by the stovetop and on the dining table.

name: PLATS Salt & pepper shaker
description: An S and a P on top of these salt and pepper shakers with clean lines will help you and your dinner guests choose the right one when the food needs some spicing up.

name: BALUNGEN Soap dispenser
description: Inspired by fine bathrooms at the turn of the century, the BALUNGEN series is just as clever as it is beautiful with details like hidden screws and chrome finish that create a harmonious look in your bathroom.

name: IKEA 365+ Carafe with stopper
description: The IKEA 365+ series has everything for the table – to be enjoyed for its everyday simplicity or spiced up with colors and accessories. Made from tempered glass that holds both hot and cold beverages.

name: SVAMPIG Sponge
description: These sponges have a soft and a coarse side – perfect to have close at hand when it's time to take care of the washing up.

name: IKEA 365+ IHÄRDIG Spice mill
description: A durable spice mill for fresh-ground spices with adjustable ceramic grinding mechanism.
